sentences.en: " There is a premium on sharpness of mind and the ability to accumulate money.
sentences.cn: 他说: “ 人们重视思维的敏捷和积聚财富的能力.

sentences.en: Chief of Staff : Accumulate 10 million total heal points.
sentences.cn: 总共,积累1000万(好多)点治愈的生命值.

sentences.en: During the course of the TBP distillation, the distillates which accumulate between specified temperatures are withdrawn.
sentences.cn: 在真沸点蒸馏过程中, 对规定温度范围内所收集的馏分可加以回收.

sentences.en: Fat tends to accumulate around the hips and thighs.
sentences.cn: 脂肪常常积聚在臀部和大腿部位。

sentences.en: Fluid tends to accumulate beneath the flaps.
sentences.cn: 液体倾向于积存在皮瓣下.

sentences.en: Households accumulate wealth across a broad spectrum of assets.
sentences.cn: 家庭在以各种各样的资产形式积累财富。

sentences.en: It is the business of the scientist to accumulate knowledge about the universe and all that is in it, and to find, if he is able, common factors which underlie and account for the facts that he knows.
sentences.cn: 科学家要做的事就是积累有关宇宙和宇宙中的一切事物的知识, 而且要是可能的话, 找出那些既能构成科学家所知事实的基础, 又能解释这些事实的共同因素。

sentences.en: It is unjust that a privileged few should continue to accumulate wealth.
sentences.cn: 少数特权阶级继续积聚财富，这是不公平的。

sentences.en: It was his ambition to accumulate a million dollars before he turned thirty.
sentences.cn: 他立志要在而立之年以前攒够100万美元。

sentences.en: Jason: No, I just want to accumulate some useful experience there.
sentences.cn: 杰森:不想，我只想在那里积累一些有用的经验。

sentences.en: Lead can accumulate in the body until toxic levels are reached.
sentences.cn: 铅会在体内积聚直至造成铅中毒。

sentences.en: Often, these forces will accumulate and create a negative stress reaction.
sentences.cn: 通常情况下, 各种压力累积起来会变成一种负面的压力反应.

sentences.en: Some of the grid sections will accumulate immediately in the trowel areas.
sentences.cn: 有些板栅碎块可能立即堆积在刮刀的地方.

sentences.en: Some sea animals accumulate elements like vanadium and iodine within their cells.
sentences.cn: 某些海洋动物在其细胞内积累象钒和碘一类元素.

sentences.en: The construction site may not accumulate a large number of combustible materials.
sentences.cn: 施工现场不得大量积存可燃材料.

sentences.en: The fluorine does not accumulate indefinitely in the water.
sentences.cn: 氟不会在水里无限制地积累.

sentences.en: These people will also have more chance to accumulate wealth as well.
sentences.cn: 这样的人也会有更多的机会拢聚财富.

sentences.en: We let the mending accumulate until Wednesday.
sentences.cn: 我们让需缝补的衣服一直积存到星期三.

sentences.en: What is the moral of this fable? If you want to accumulate enduring wealth, do not lend to grasshoppers.
sentences.cn: 这则故事的寓意是什么？如果你希望积累长久的财富，就不要借钱给蚱蜢。

sentences.en: When molybdenum is deficient, nitrate may accumulate to a toxic level in the plant.
sentences.cn: 当钼不足时, 硝酸盐会积累在植物中达到毒害的程度.

words.tran_cn: 累计的；累积的；积聚而成的
蓄电池；[计] 累加器；积聚者

trans.tran_en: to gradually get more and more money, possessions, knowledge etc over a period of time
to gradually get more and more money, possessions, knowledge etc over a period of time
